'''''Cell, Splinter''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to use [[Pneuma]] or [[Ousia]] attacks to interrupt a [[Breacher Primus]]'s stressed state.
